SELECT A.SNUM AS snum ,A.BID AS bid ,A.SINTRO AS sintro ,A.SNAME AS sname ,A.SADDRESS AS saddress ,A.SDETAILADDR AS sdetailaddr ,A.SPHONE AS sphone ,A.STIME_START AS stime_start ,A.STIME_END AS stime_end ,A.SPARKING AS sparking ,A.SIMAGE AS simage ,A.STYPE AS stype ,A.SHOLIDAY AS sholiday ,A.SDATE AS sdate ,A.SRATELV0 AS sratelv0 ,A.SRATELV1 AS sratelv1 ,A.SRATELV2 AS sratelv2 ,A.SRATELV3 AS sratelv3 ,A.SLIMIT AS slimit ,B.AVALUE AS avalue FROM STORES A LEFT JOIN ADMINS B ON A.STYPE = B.ANUM WHERE BID = #{bid} ORDER BY SDATE DESC
